nodes.text: The Wookiee's Codpiece was a cantina on the planet of Nim Drovis. The walls were lined with a pink, plush material. In 13 ABY, the 3PO-series protocol droid C-3PO auditioned to perform music in the Codpiece so he could earn money to leave the planet with his counterpart, R2-D2. The assistant manager of the Wookiee's Codpiece compared his performance to that of a festering jizz-box and turned him away, saying that the cantina already had one of those in a corner.
The Wookiee's Codpiece was briefly mentioned in Planet of Twilight, a 1997 novel by Barbara Hambly.
